original_text: Then they gave the money to Barnabas and Saul. Barnabas and Saul took this gift to the leaders of the believers in Jerusalem.
korean_text: 이를 실행하여 바나바와 사울의 손으로 장로들에게 보내니라

sentences.original_text: Then they gave the money to Barnabas and Saul
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 그들은 바나바와 사울에게 돈을 주었습니다

sentences.original_text: Barnabas and Saul took this gift
to the leaders of the believers in Jerusalem
